```{r setup}
library(RNAseqStat)
```

`RNAseqStat::enhance_volcano` can make a volcano from DEG data frame which contains log Fold Change and P value.

```{r enhance_volcano}
enhance_volcano(DEG_df,x = 'log2FoldChange', y = 'pvalue')
```
